Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Polka de W. R. (Franz Behr)

1911 · Threlfall and Norris II/18 and III/2

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of Lachtäubchen, a scherzpolka by Franz Behr (op. 303). Rachmaninoff knew this piece from his father, Vasily [Wasili] Rachmaninoff.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 5
